title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8001.13 - Town of Colonie
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8001.13 - Town of Colonie

State Regulations
(a) Route 7. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 7 between the Schenectady-Albany
county line and IR 87 in the Town of Colonie. (b) Route 914H. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 914H between IR 787 and Arch Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8001.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
